version_description: Just a few tweaks and bug fixes this time around.
Every few weeks we make improvements to the Slacker app. Keep your updates turned on so you don’t miss a thing.

•Featured stations will appear at the top of the main page, plus we’ve made new content easier to find.
•User Chuck Reynolds tweeted us & requested a 3D touch widget to quickly get to recently played stations and other shortcuts…so BOOM. We made it & it’s in this update. Tweet us your ideas any time @SlackerRadio.
•Updates to controls allow you to fine tune Favorites Radio, avoid adding duplicate songs to your faves, and set content preferences from the “now playing” screen.

•Featured stations will appear at the top of the main page, plus we’ve made new content easier to find.
•User Chuck Reynolds tweeted us & requested a 3D touch widget to quickly get to recently played stations and other shortcuts…so BOOM. We made it & it’s in this update. Tweet us your ideas any time @SlackerRadio.
•Updates to controls allow you to fine tune Favorites Radio, avoid adding duplicate songs to your faves, and set content preferences from the “now playing” screen.
We squashed some bugs, because that's what we do.
We came here to fix bugs and chew bubblegum...and we're all out of bubble gum.
Every 3 weeks, we enhance the Slacker Radio app to make it exceptional just for you. Tweet us your feedback or ideas @SlackerRadio
Every 3 weeks, we enhance the Slacker Radio app to make it exceptional just for you. Tweet us your feedback or ideas @SlackerRadio
Every 3 weeks, we enhance the Slacker Radio app to make it exceptional just for you. Tweet us your feedback or ideas @SlackerRadio

• OMG why wasn’t the “Prevent Sleep” function working? I’ll tell ya why: ALIENS invaded your phone and, while it was in sleep mode, they used it to communicate with their home planet Gleepglorp. We spoke to the offending extraterrestrials, asked them to please stop using your phone to communicate with Gleepglorp’s High Commander Blafaglaffle, and sent them packing back to their home planet. “Prevent Sleep” functionality has officially returned and your phone is now 100% alien-free.
• We are so sorry for nagging you to turn on your bluetooth every time you launched Slacker. Like, what if you don't WANT to turn on bluetooth? That is perfectly acceptable and it is totally your decision and we are very sorry for trying to make you feel bad about your lifestyle choices. You do you. No more nagging from us.
• ‘Bout that #offlinelyfe: there were some glitches & we fixed ‘em. BOOM.
General improvements and bug fixes.

OMGGGGGG WHAT IS THIS THING??? A sleep timer??? I mean, A FREAKING SLEEP TIMER??? You mean I can set the timer so Josh Groban’s sweet, sweet voice can sing me to sleep as I can dream about running my fingers through his luxurious mane of hair while he makes a decadent tuna noodle casserole for us to feed to each other with 14K gold-plated spoons under the gentle light of a waning moon while vacationing on his wildly expensive ultra-yacht in the south of France and then having the tickle-fight to end all tickle-fights as the tinkling sound of our laughter mingles with the wistful cries of exotic sea birds calling out to each other in search of the sweet comfort of companionship under a blanket of crystalline stars??? Cool. I've always wanted a sleep timer.
We also fixed some bugs. So yay.

• Signing in with Google, what’s the deal? We made a bug fix, that’s for real. No more messages while you’re offline, urging you to waste your time. We repent our grievous sin: bugging you incessantly to log in.
• Sometimes Slacker stopped and froze, we’re not down with bugs like those. We think we've fixed the reason why, if we didn’t, please reply. We’ll write you back in record time, but only if you make it rhyme!
General bug fixes and improvements.
General bug fixes and improvements.

I don't like your little games
Don't like the stupid way
You don't listen when I say
What you should do, no, I don't like you
I don't like when I hit "ban"
You act like you don't understand
That I'm really not a fan
Isn't cool, no, I don't like you (oh!)
Ooh, look what you made me do
Look what you made me do
You made me fix Ford Sync bugs, including a malfunctioning "ban" button and voice command issues.
"I'm sorry, the old Slacker can't come to the phone right now"
"Why?"
"Oh, 'cause she's dead!"

I don't like your little games
Don't like the stupid way
You don't show up in CarPlay
Tell me what to do 'cause I can't find you
I don't like when I hit "ban"
You act like you don't understand
That I'm really not a fan
Isn't cool, no, I don't like you (oh!)
Ooh, look what you made me do
Look what you made me do
You made me fix CarPlay and Ford Sync bugs, including a malfunctioning "ban" button and voice command issues.
"I'm sorry, the old Slacker can't come to the phone right now"
"Why?"
"Oh, 'cause she's dead!"

POP QUIZ: Three of these release notes are true and one is not. Can you guess which one is the fake???

Fixed crashes when users tried to launch Slacker through Entune or Enform.
Fixed display bugs with Slacker in Apple CarPlay.
Fixed issue where every Justin Bieber song was replaced with the sound of a toilet flushing for five minutes.
Fixed iOS display imperfections.

Hey, fancypants. Look at you over here with your shiny, gorgeous iPhone X. While the rest of us are driving around on tires past their tread limits with a cracked iPhone 6 plugged into our cigarette lighters, please, I beg of you, update Slacker for better X support and crash fixes so you can fully enjoy your upscale Apple experience. The rest of us will dream of better phones and better lives while waiting in the drive-thu for our 99-cent tacos and wistfully remembering the days when phones cost less than a thousand FREAKING dollars. #jealousyisanuglyemotion #canIpleaseborrowyourcoolphone

SLACKER VS SANTA
In this corner: SANTA

Santa doesn’t know what you want unless you hit the mall, sit on his lap, and read him your list. Santa only gives you presents if you are nice.

In this corner: SLACKER

Slacker knows what you want, and it’s on the HOME page: see artists we recommend based on your listening behavior, then tap on an artist circle to learn more or start a station. Slacker gives you music recommendations even if you’re naughty (actually…ESPECIALLY if you’re naughty).

WINNER: SLACKER

Also: It’s a Christmas miracle! Some Premium users were unable to listen Offline in airplane mode, but that’s been fixed. Some other users were unable to add some songs to new playlists that were already added to other playlists, and that’s been fixed, too. Merry, merry.

Hey, fancypants. Look at you over here with your shiny, gorgeous iPhone X. While the rest of us are driving around on tires past their tread limits with a cracked iPhone 6 plugged into our cigarette lighters, please, I beg of you, update Slacker for better X support and crash fixes so you can fully enjoy your upscale Apple experience. The rest of us will dream of better phones and better lives while waiting in the drive-thu for our 99-cent tacos and wistfully remembering the days when phones cost less than a thousand FREAKING dollars. #jealousyisanuglyemotion #canIpleaseborrowyourcoolphone
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
We fixed some bugs.
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
Bug fix to restore Offline functionality.

It’s the biggest thing to happen to Slacker since that time we made a Nickelback Count Up (don’t ask): live streaming VIDEO!

We’re streaming live video from the top music festivals on the planet, and you can watch for FREE right inside of your Slacker app.

So what do you have to do to watch your favorite artists perform live?

Just keep an eye on the Featured page in the app for upcoming events, including the Sziget Festival in Budapest, Seattle’s Bumbershoot festival, and EDC Orlando. Click on the stream, pour yourself a drink, and invite your favorite friend over for a little “Slacker and chill.”

Concerts. In your freaking PHONE. Who loves you, baby?

There’s no place like HOME…so we made you one. It’s super comfy and it smells like pumpkin spice candles.

Now, when you open Slacker, we’ll send you straight HOME, where you’ll have quick access to your recently played stuff, favorites radio, live concert video, and content we think you'll be into.

Swipe up from the bottom or tap play on the mini-player to pick up where you left off last time you listened.

Welcome HOME! We left some tuna noodle casserole in the Crock Pot for ya.
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements.
Fixed: Recently Played music on Home has been intermittently disappearing for some users.  This release should resolve that issue.
So…some things on iPhone X were not displaying correctly, and we totally fixed that. Because we love you.
Several bugs introduced with iOS 12 have been fixed, including issues related to Chromecast, sharing, and fine tuning stations.

SLACKER VS SANTA


In this corner: SANTA

Santa doesn’t know what you want unless you hit the mall, sit on his lap, and read him your list. Santa only gives you presents if you are nice.


In this corner: SLACKER

Slacker knows what you want, and it’s on the HOME page: see artists we recommend based on your listening behavior, then tap on an artist circle to learn more or start a station. Slacker gives you music recommendations even if you’re naughty (actually…ESPECIALLY if you’re naughty).


WINNER: SLACKER



Also: It’s a Christmas miracle! Some Premium users were unable to listen Offline in airplane mode, but that’s been fixed. Some other users were unable to add some songs to new playlists that were already added to other playlists, and that’s been fixed, too. Merry, merry.

Also: It’s a Christmas miracle! Some Premium users were unable to listen Offline in airplane mode, but that’s been fixed. Some other users were unable to add some songs to new playlists that were already added to other playlists, and that’s been fixed, too. Merry, merry.

Brace yourself for MAJOR changes: Slacker Radio is now LiveXLive powered by Slacker.

LiveXLive brings you premium livestreams and on-demand music experiences from the world's top music festivals and concerts, including Rock in Rio, EDC Las Vegas, Hangout Music Festival, and tons more, and you’ll be able to experience it all inside the new LiveXLive powered by Slacker app.

Everything you love about Slacker will still be there, but now you’ll have even MORE to fall in love with:

• Global navigation so you can find what you’re looking for faster
• More personalized recommendations, so you can discover new content picked just for you
• Livestream performances and video on demand from the biggest artists on the planet
• Fresh music, comedy, and podcast stations (still curated by humans, of course!) will join the lineup of your Slacker faves

• Some users reported startup issues, and those bugs should be squashed in this release.
• We heard you: the new heart color was REALLY hard to see. They’re filled in now, so yay!

EXTRA EXTRA! LiveXLive has more NEWS!
In addition to the daily ABC streams that you know and love, LiveXLive is now joining forces with NBC to bring you a full slate of additional coverage and world-class programming. As a result, our News/Talk section boasts over twenty additional options, ensuring that you will be the most well-informed person at the water cooler.
NBC journalists such as Lester Holt, Rachel Maddow, and Brian Williams can now be part of your daily LiveXLive listening experience.
Listen to audio versions of the latest episodes of shows ranging from Hardball With Chris Matthews and The Last Word With Lawrence O’Donnell, to Morning Joe, Meet the Press, and Fast Money.
Access your favorite NBC shows news/talk shows, on-demand, 24/7
Of course, once you’re done loading your brain with the latest news from all over the world, LiveXLive has got your back with hundred of exclusive music stations and millions of songs. We’re here for you.

We've updated Chromecast for iOS 13, which means you now have Chromecast support for our livestream events. Chat, interact with the music, and cast it all to your gigantic TV. Concert party at your house! We’ll bring the chips & salsa.

We've updated Chromecast for iOS 13, which means you now have Chromecast support for our livestream events. Chat, interact with the music, and cast it all to your gigantic TV. Concert party at your house! We’ll bring the chips & salsa.
We've fixed issues with offline playback that were preventing some of y'all from playing certain tracks on downloaded stations and playlists. Breathe easy, crisis averted.
We've fixed issues with offline playback that were preventing some of y'all from playing certain tracks on downloaded stations and playlists. Breathe easy, crisis averted.

What’s new? Good question! Here are the answers:

- Video Playlists: When you watch a video, we will now automatically queue up a custom feed of related videos. All you have to do is sit there and watch!
- Livestream Artist Navigation: “Heart" artists and gain the power to listen to their stations directly from livestream schedules.
- Real-time Livestream Updates: Once a live event begins, your app will automatically refresh so you can stream your favorite artists immediately.
- We’ve also introduced general bug fixes related to playback and app navigation.
- And if you thought the Ford Sync experience was great before, well, now it’s even better.

What’s new? Good question! Here are the answers:

- Video Playlists: When you watch a video, we will now automatically queue up a custom feed of related videos. All you have to do is sit there and watch!
- Livestream Artist Navigation: “Heart" artists and gain the power to listen to their stations directly from livestream schedules.
- Real-time Livestream Updates: Once a live event begins, your app will automatically refresh so you can stream your favorite artists immediately.
- We’ve also introduced general bug fixes related to playback and app navigation.
- And if you thought the Ford Sync experience was great before, well, now it’s even better.
Our new Message Center keeps you in the loop. Go to “My Library/Profile" and tap the bell icon for the latest music, shows, deals & more.
Our Artist, Album, Station, and Song pages were in DESPERATE need of a makeover. Not only are they now drop-dead gorgeous, but they make it easier to find, browse, and play the music you love.

Our Artist, Album, Station, and Song pages just keep getting better! With this release, they’re cleaner, prettier, and easier to use. We’ve also added something shiny and new: a LATEST RELEASE tile for faster access to new content from your favorite artists.

Have you participated in one of our livestreams yet? Well you totally should, because we've enhanced our chat, profile management, and interaction elements. Unless, of course you HATE fun. In that case, stay far, far away.

This is MAJOR: If you love podcasts, we've got you covered. Our latest release includes tons of new podcast content, with 80+ shows complete with episode archives. Plus, we’ve got all-new player functionality to make your listening experience even better--track forward/back, pick up where you left off, and more. You’re welcome.
LiveXLive has your music, events, and podcasts…all in one place!

With this release, we're rolling out iOS picture in picture video functionality. This means that the LiveXLive video you're watching will keep playing, even when you background the app to do other stuff on your phone. Now you can go ahead and check your email...or read the latest bonkers text thread from your Aunt Janet. Your favorite LiveXLive video will be right there with you, and you won't miss a moment!
